name: Coffee, Please! - The Coffee Shop Simulator
name_original: Coffee, Please! - The Coffee Shop Simulator
description:
Note: This is a early version that is lacking a LOT of features that I intend to have in the alpha, BUT it is playable. I am actively looking for feedback. Feel free to create videos.

Current controls (subject to change):

Movement: WASD
Run: Left Shift
Crouch: Left Ctrl
Throw: T
Interact / Pickup / Drop: Left Mouse Button
Rotate Item (when holding item): R
Item Distance (when holding): Mouse Wheel
Normal (Interaction) Mode: 1
Furniture Mode: 2
Unboxing Mode: 3 (while holding a Delivery Box)
Package Furniture: C (while in Furniture Mode)
Open Console: F1 (.help for list of commands)
